goal.ch:
主要訓練學生以下幾種能力：
一、閱讀專書與論文的能力
二、整理文獻、報告表達的能力
三、獨立思考、學術討論的能力
goal.en:
This course primarily trains students in the following abilities:
1. The ability to read textbooks and academic papers
2. The ability to organize literature and express reports
3. The ability to think independently and engage in academic discussions“

outline.ch:
預計將從以下幾個主題中選擇一個進行深入探討與雙向討論：
一、通訊理論及其應用（Communication Theory and its Applications）
二、資訊理論及其應用（Information Theory and its Applications）
三、量子資訊理論及其應用（Quantum Information Theory and its Applications）
先備知識要求：線性代數、機率導論（大學部程度）。
第一次上課安排在9月19日。有興趣的同學可以先試聽第一堂課，再決定是否選修。
註：歡迎大學部學生選課！（系統會擋修，請另外向我拿密碼卡加選）
若有任何問題或需要更多資訊，請隨時e-mail聯繫我。
outline.en:
Choose one topic from the following directions for teaching and conduct a two-way discussion:
1. Communication Theory and its Applications
2. Information Theory and its Applications
3. Quantum Information Theory and its Applications
Prerequisites: Linear Algebra (I + II), Introduction to Probability (undergraduate level)
Note: Undergraduate students are welcome to enroll! (In order to enroll, undergraduate students should obtain an add/drop code from me.)

flexDiscription.en: Adjustments will be made based on students' learning progress
